title: Another citizen dies in fuel queue
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Another person who was waiting in queue at a petrol station in Dankotuwa has passed away after collapsing.
Police stated that the incident had taken place at around 7:00 p.m. last night while the deceased was in line to get diesel.
The deceased has been identified as a 47 year old resident of Gonawila, Pannala.
The body has been placed at the Marawila Hospital and the post mortem will be conducted today (10).

41 MPs who quit government to meet President Rajapaksa on Sunday (10)
Imran Khan becomes Pakistan first prime minister to be voted out of power
